title: A Live Reminder from Leaguefest Concert that the 2nd Pentakill Album is on our way!
body:
They even played a small bit from it and showed a bit of animation with Mordekaiser shredding monsters as a teaser! :>

Edit: Almost forgot to link a picture of the concert during the announcement:
https://twitter.com/moobeat/status/792218579915583488

**Edit II:** Timestamps of the VOD provided by Moobeat and the crew at Surrender@20:

* Pentakill Medley - [4:07:59](https://www.twitch.tv/riotgames/v/97690975?t=04h07m59s)

* Pentakill 2 teaser - [4:12:20](https://www.twitch.tv/riotgames/v/97690975?t=04h12m20s)

replies.body: I cannot wait to hear them and to know which item names will be added as song names

I wonder if one of the Elixers will get a song.
I mean, thinking of it, their names are pretty strong and _metal_. :P

Wait a bloody minute...

Mordekaiser shredding monsters?!

Please tell me it was some sort of cinematic.

That's what it seemed like, at least. But yeah, it was an animation.

Looked to me like some mix between _Ignite_'s and the _Zombie Slayers_ Login's animation styles . :P

Here's the timestamp for the teaser, provided by the crew at Surrender@20:

* Pentakill 2 teaser - [4:12:20](https://www.twitch.tv/riotgames/v/97690975?t=04h12m20s)
